display_name: Calculated - RDI in non-supine body position (>= 2% desaturation)
description: missing if studies with problems scoring REM/NREM or if studies scored as sleep/wake or REM sleep time is 0
calculation: 60*(hrop2 + hnrop2 + carop2 + canop2 + oarop2 + oanop2 + marop2 + manrop2)/(remepop+nremepop)
